All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
allAppointments
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all Appointment objects used through out the program.
allContacts
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all Contact objects used through out the program.
allCountries
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all Country objects used through out the program.
allCustomers
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all Customer objects used through out the program.
allFirst_level_divisions
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all First Level Division objects used through out the program.
allUsers
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for all User objects used through out the program.
Appointment
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual Appointments.
appointment_controller
Controller class for the appointment.fxml file.
Contact
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual Contacts.
country
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual Countries.
Customer
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual Customers.
customer_controller
Controller class for the customer.fxml file.
delete_confirmation_controller
Controller class for the delete_error.fxml file.
errorBoxes
The errorBoxes class contains methods for handling and displaying error messages to the user
first_level_division
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual First Level Divisions.
home_controller
Controller class for the home_controller.fxml file.
inputcheck
This is a utility class that provides methods to check user input on certain text fields.
JDBC
The JDBC class provides methods for opening and closing a database connection.
login_controller
Controller class for the login.fxml file.
Main
The Main class is responsible for starting the application and handling scene changes.
notification_error
Controller class for the notification_error.fxml file.
SQL_deletes
The SQL_deletes class contains methods for deleting a Customer or an Appointment from the database.
SQL_inserts
The SQL_inserts class contains methods for inserting a Customer or an Appointment into the database.
SQL_queries
The SQL_queries class contains methods for running queries and collecting data from tables in the database.
SQL_updates
The SQL_updates class contains methods for updating a Customer or an Appointment in the database.
time_zones
The time_zones class contains methods for converting between UTC and local timestamps.
User
This class handles, stores, and manipulates data for individual Users.
